heroes.name: Prometheus
heroes.skill: God of forethought, fire, and crafty counsel

heroes.name: Morpheus
heroes.skill: The god of dreams and of sleep

heroes.name: Poseidon
heroes.skill: God of the sea, storms, earthquakes, and horses

heroes.name: Aphrodite
heroes.skill: Goddess of love, lust, passion, pleasure, beauty, and sexuality
